channel.title: [667/7**] Recolouring Items (Making Custom Items) [TuT]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]First download this tool posted on this thread: 667/718+ itemdef editor - http://uppit.com/rsnqmfjhgl0e/ItemDef_Editor.rar ----------> 100% To Dragonkk For It[/size]
Download it, Extract it, Open the folder.
Now, go into your source files and open your cache folder located in data > cache. Then select all the files in your cache folder and copy them into the cache folder in the item editor.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5YXmn.png[/img]
Now run the 'run-gui.bat' and this will open; Ignore the errors in the cmd and then click the 'items' tab.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/sifmb.png[/img]
Now I will create a black partyhat just for example:
First, find item 1038, highlight it > clone > save. Now, scroll right down to the bottom of the items list, and you will see there 'red partyhat'. Now highlight it > edit, here you can edit the item name, in this case black partyhat. Now because we are making a black partyhat, we are going to use the black model colour code (898). So in the 'Changed Model Colors:' field, enter:
Code: 926=898;
This will make the partyhat black. Colors:
Yellow: 8128 White: 127 Purple: 51136 Lime: 17350 Dark Red (Or Dragon): 926 Lava: 6073
So there you go, you now have your black partyhat created, just spawn the item in-game and it will be black. (Note: if you change the name to something other than partyhat, it won't wear on your head and you'll have to add it to Equipment.java!)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Rnx0g.png[/img]
Hope Your Like This Tutorial!

item.title: [667/7**] Recolouring Items (Making Custom Items) [TuT]
item.dc:creator: @Flannery Flannery
item.description:
@Flannery wrote:

[size=12pt][font=georgia]Um… I’m sorry for grave digging, but how would I recolour a Dragon platebody? Like, if I wanted to make it Black, would I use the same code as the partyhat? The: 926=898; ?
Or does it have its own colour code?
And if so, how would I go about finding the correct code?
I’ve been googling this for hours…
I have even tried Runel0cus(Why does this keep changing to google?), and Rune-Server. I have been unable to find an answer.
I am using the Matrix cache, and the very same Item DEF editor.

Here is what I have on my DEF editor right now:[/font][/size]

[size=12pt][font=georgia]But that is not working.
And yes, I placed my cache back into the correct folder, then compiled it.

I would really appreciate some help. =/[/font][/size]

Read full topic

item.title: [667/7**] Recolouring Items (Making Custom Items) [TuT]
item.dc:creator: @Smileur Smileur
item.description:
@Smileur wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:8, topic:453914”]Forgot to make them, but h1 sk1ller posted some a while back.

[quote author=h1 sk1ller link=topic=458158.msg3352595#msg3352595 date=1285479432]

491770 = White With Tint Of Blue 479770 = Camo Green 476770 = Icing Green 470770 = Neon Yellow With A Hint Of Lime Green 461770 = Deep Orange 428770 = Another Blue 422770 = Yet Another Nice Green 419770 = Nice Green 380770 = Pink 374770 = Shiny Purple 359770 = Blue 356770 = Dark Green 353770 = White Green 350770 = Forest Green 347770 = Neon Green 338770 = Another Nice Yellow 332770 = Nice Orange Color 311770 = Light Purple 305770 = Crayon Blue 302770 = Dark Blue 296770 = Blue Darker Than Cyan By Abit 290770 = Bluish Green 266770 = Bronze 257770 = Bright Pink 246770 = Pinky Purple 226770 = Aqua 210770 = Lime Green 34770 = Cyan 76770 = Nice Yellow 87770 = Nice Green 92770 = Neon Greenish Color 130770 = Pinky Red 129770 = Chewing Gum Pink 123770 = Pink 933 = Red
[/quote][/quote]
THANKS, was looking for this !

Read full topic
